name: Cold Meat
summary: Pete is a lazy guy who lives in a small town in Bavaria and loves his music heavy metal and food fast. Finally the big day has come; the Smalltown Fast Food Fortress opens, and Pete knows just what do to: Get those burgers, and get them quick and in high quantity! Arriving at the chain restaurant of his choice, he can't help but notice one big problem: They built that thing on an ancient Celtic burial site, and now terrifying undead clan warriors from 500 B.C. have risen from their graves and occupied the Fast Food Fortress! And all they seek is merciless revenge, and all they crave is juicy human brain...or is it? Nominee for best puzzles in 2009.
